select.longname: 根据批次号查询批量开户记录数
select.sql: select count(1) from knb_opbt where btchno = #btchno# and acctdt = #acctdt#
select count(1) from knb_opbt where btchno = #btchno# and acctdt = #acctdt#
select count(1) from knb_opbt where btchno = #btchno# and acctdt = #acctdt#

select.longname: 根据批次号查询批量开户明细第一条记录
select.sql: select * from knb_opbt where btchno = #btchno# and acctdt = #acctdt#
select * from knb_opbt where btchno = #btchno# and acctdt = #acctdt#
select * from knb_opbt where btchno = #btchno# and acctdt = #acctdt#

select.longname: 根据批次号查询批量开户结果
select.sql: select * from knb_opbt where btchno = #btchno# and acctdt = #acctdt#
select * from knb_opbt where btchno = #btchno# and acctdt = #acctdt#
select * from knb_opbt where btchno = #btchno# and acctdt = #acctdt#

select.longname: 根据批次号查询批量开户正常记录
select.sql: select * from knb_opbt where btchno = #btchno# and corpno=#corpno# and acctdt = #acctdt# and ( openrt in ( '1','3' ) or openrt is null )
select * from knb_opbt where btchno = #btchno# and corpno=#corpno# and acctdt = #acctdt# and ( openrt in ( '1','3' ) or openrt is null )
select * from knb_opbt where btchno = #btchno# and corpno=#corpno# and acctdt = #acctdt# and ( openrt in ( '1','3' ) or openrt is null )

select.longname: 电子账户作废
select.sql: select * from kna_cust a where a.acctst = #acctst# and a.cuacst = #cuacst# and a.corpno = #corpno#
select * from kna_cust a where a.acctst = #acctst# and a.cuacst = #cuacst# and a.corpno = #corpno#
select * from kna_cust a where a.acctst = #acctst# and a.cuacst = #cuacst# and a.corpno = #corpno#

select.longname: 查找电子账户升级登记簿
select.sql: select a.* from knb_prom a where a.aplydt <= #trandt# and a.promsv = #promsv# and a.promst = #promst#
select a.* from knb_prom a where a.aplydt <= #trandt# and a.promsv = #promsv# and a.promst = #promst#
select a.* from knb_prom a where a.aplydt <= #trandt# and a.promsv = #promsv# and a.promst = #promst#

select.longname: 查找电子账户表身份核查记录为核查中的记录
select.sql: select a.* from kna_cust a where a.corpno=#corpno# and a.idckrt = #idckrt# or a.mpckrt = #mpckrt#
select a.* from kna_cust a where a.corpno=#corpno# and a.idckrt = #idckrt# or a.mpckrt = #mpckrt#
select a.* from kna_cust a where a.corpno=#corpno# and a.idckrt = #idckrt# or a.mpckrt = #mpckrt#

select.longname: 查找升级登记簿身份核查记录为核查中的记录
select.sql: select a.* from knb_prom a where ( a.idckrt = #idckrt# or a.mpckrt = #mpckrt# ) and a.promst = #promst# and a.corpno=#corpno#
select a.* from knb_prom a where ( a.idckrt = #idckrt# or a.mpckrt = #mpckrt# ) and a.promst = #promst# and a.corpno=#corpno#
select a.* from knb_prom a where ( a.idckrt = #idckrt# or a.mpckrt = #mpckrt# ) and a.promst = #promst# and a.corpno=#corpno#

select.longname: 查找亲情钱包关联关系表身份核查记录为核查中的记录
select.sql: select a.* from kna_relt a where a.idckrt = #idckrt#
select a.* from kna_relt a where a.idckrt = #idckrt#
select a.* from kna_relt a where a.idckrt = #idckrt#

select.longname: 查询产品基础属性表待启用的产品信息
select.sql: select a.* from kup_dppb a where a.efctdt <= #trandt# and a.prodst in( '3','6' )
select a.* from kup_dppb a where a.efctdt <= #trandt# and a.prodst in( '3','6' )
select a.* from kup_dppb a where a.efctdt <= #trandt# and a.prodst in( '3','6' )

select.longname: 查询产品基础属性表待停用的产品信息
select.sql: select a.* from kup_dppb a where a.inefdt <= #trandt# and a.prodst = #prodst#
select a.* from kup_dppb a where a.inefdt <= #trandt# and a.prodst = #prodst#
select a.* from kup_dppb a where a.inefdt <= #trandt# and a.prodst = #prodst#

select.longname: 查询内部户产品基础属性表待启用的产品信息
select.sql: select a.* from gl_knp_busi a where a.bgdate <= #trandt# and a.busist in( '3','6' )
select a.* from gl_knp_busi a where a.bgdate <= #trandt# and a.busist in( '3','6' )
select a.* from gl_knp_busi a where a.bgdate <= #trandt# and a.busist in( '3','6' )

select.longname: 查询内部户产品基础属性表待停用的产品信息
select.sql: select a.* from gl_knp_busi a where a.eddate <= #trandt# and a.busist = #prodst#
select a.* from gl_knp_busi a where a.eddate <= #trandt# and a.busist = #prodst#
select a.* from gl_knp_busi a where a.eddate <= #trandt# and a.busist = #prodst#

update.longname: 更新产品基础属性表状态
update.sql: update kup_dppb a set a.prodst = #prodst#,a.tmstmp =#tmstmp# where a.corpno = #corpno# and a.prodcd = #prodcd#
update kup_dppb a set a.prodst = #prodst#,a.tmstmp =#tmstmp# where a.corpno = #corpno# and a.prodcd = #prodcd#
update kup_dppb a set a.prodst = #prodst#,a.tmstmp =#tmstmp# where a.corpno = #corpno# and a.prodcd = #prodcd#

update.longname: 更新内部户产品基础属性表状态
update.sql: update gl_knp_busi a set a.busist = #busist# where a.busino = #busino# and a.corpno = #corpno#
update gl_knp_busi a set a.busist = #busist# where a.busino = #busino# and a.corpno = #corpno#
update gl_knp_busi a set a.busist = #busist# where a.busino = #busino# and a.corpno = #corpno#

update.longname: 更新电子账户升级登记簿升级记录作废
update.sql: update knb_prom set promst = #promst# where custac =#custac# and promsv = #promsv# and promst = #odpmst#
update knb_prom set promst = #promst# where custac =#custac# and promsv = #promsv# and promst = #odpmst#
update knb_prom set promst = #promst# where custac =#custac# and promsv = #promsv# and promst = #odpmst#

select.longname: 查询签约明细交易当日的交易记录数
select.sql: select sum(c.cnt) from ( select count(1) cnt from kna_sign_detl a where a.signdt = #trandt# and a.signst = #signst1# union select count(1) cnt from kna_sign_detl b where b.cncldt = #trandt# and b.signst = #signst2# ) c

select sum(c.cnt) from ( select count(1) cnt from kna_sign_detl a where a.signdt = #trandt# and a.signst = #signst1# union select count(1) cnt from kna_sign_detl b where b.cncldt = #trandt# and b.signst = #signst2# ) c

select sum(c.cnt) from ( select count(1) cnt from kna_sign_detl a where a.signdt = #trandt# and a.signst = #signst1# union select count(1) cnt from kna_sign_detl b where b.cncldt = #trandt# and b.signst = #signst2# ) c

select.longname: 查询签约明细交易当日的交易记录明细
select.sql: select S.signst, S.custno, D.cardno,D.status, B.custna, S.fxacct, B.brchno, '' brchna,S.trprod prodcd, '' prodna , S.keepam, S.trmiam, S.tmstmp, '' trandt, S.signdt, S.effedt, B.brchno, '' servtp from kna_sign_detl S left join kna_cust B on S.custac = B.custac left join kna_acdc D on S.custac = D.custac where S.signdt = #trandt# and S.signst = #signst1# union select S.signst, S.custno, D.cardno, D.status, B.custna, S.fxacct, B.brchno, '' brchna, S.trprod prodcd, '' prodna , S.keepam, S.trmiam, S.tmstmp, '' trandt, S.signdt, S.effedt, B.brchno, '' servtp from kna_sign_detl S left join kna_cust B on S.custac = B.custac left join kna_acdc D on S.custac = D.custac where S.cncldt = #trandt# and S.signst = #signst2#

select S.signst, S.custno, D.cardno,D.status, B.custna, S.fxacct, B.brchno, '' brchna,S.trprod prodcd, '' prodna , S.keepam, S.trmiam, S.tmstmp, '' trandt, S.signdt, S.effedt, B.brchno, '' servtp from kna_sign_detl S left join kna_cust B on S.custac = B.custac left join kna_acdc D on S.custac = D.custac where S.signdt = #trandt# and S.signst = #signst1# union select S.signst, S.custno, D.cardno, D.status, B.custna, S.fxacct, B.brchno, '' brchna, S.trprod prodcd, '' prodna , S.keepam, S.trmiam, S.tmstmp, '' trandt, S.signdt, S.effedt, B.brchno, '' servtp from kna_sign_detl S left join kna_cust B on S.custac = B.custac left join kna_acdc D on S.custac = D.custac where S.cncldt = #trandt# and S.signst = #signst2#

select S.signst, S.custno, D.cardno,D.status, B.custna, S.fxacct, B.brchno, '' brchna,S.trprod prodcd, '' prodna , S.keepam, S.trmiam, S.tmstmp, '' trandt, S.signdt, S.effedt, B.brchno, '' servtp from kna_sign_detl S left join kna_cust B on S.custac = B.custac left join kna_acdc D on S.custac = D.custac where S.signdt = #trandt# and S.signst = #signst1# union select S.signst, S.custno, D.cardno, D.status, B.custna, S.fxacct, B.brchno, '' brchna, S.trprod prodcd, '' prodna , S.keepam, S.trmiam, S.tmstmp, '' trandt, S.signdt, S.effedt, B.brchno, '' servtp from kna_sign_detl S left join kna_cust B on S.custac = B.custac left join kna_acdc D on S.custac = D.custac where S.cncldt = #trandt# and S.signst = #signst2#

update.longname: 更新接收消息表中的消息状态
update.sql: update cus_acms set mesgst = '0',errinf = '' where mesgst = '3' and servid = 'AS_NAS_ACC_CKRTAC' and exectm = '1'
update cus_acms set mesgst = '0',errinf = '' where mesgst = '3' and servid = 'AS_NAS_ACC_CKRTAC' and exectm = '1'
update cus_acms set mesgst = '0',errinf = '' where mesgst = '3' and servid = 'AS_NAS_ACC_CKRTAC' and exectm = '1'

select.longname: 查询延迟转账批量定时任务
select.sql: select transq,capitp,cardno,cuacno,acctno, brchno,incorp,tocorp,tobrch,toacct, toscac,toacno,crcycd,tranam,tlcgam, servtp,inacna,otacna,acdate,trantp,trandt from kna_delay where ((acdate = #acdate# and actime <= #actime# ) or acdate <#acdate# ) and delayt = '0'

select transq,capitp,cardno,cuacno,acctno, brchno,incorp,tocorp,tobrch,toacct, toscac,toacno,crcycd,tranam,tlcgam, servtp,inacna,otacna,acdate,trantp,trandt from kna_delay where ((acdate = #acdate# and actime <= #actime# ) or acdate <#acdate# ) and delayt = '0'

select transq,capitp,cardno,cuacno,acctno, brchno,incorp,tocorp,tobrch,toacct, toscac,toacno,crcycd,tranam,tlcgam, servtp,inacna,otacna,acdate,trantp,trandt from kna_delay where ((acdate = #acdate# and actime <= #actime# ) or acdate <#acdate# ) and delayt = '0'

update.longname: 更新延迟转账批量定时任务
update.sql: update kna_delay set delayt = #delayt# where transq = #transq#
update kna_delay set delayt = #delayt# where transq = #transq#
update kna_delay set delayt = #delayt# where transq = #transq#

select.longname: 汇总来往账清算数据

sql.desc: 扎差汇总未冲账并且数据未同步的会计流水清算表记录，方向为借为正金额，方向为贷为负金额

select.sql: select a.acctno, a.acctna, a.acctbr, a.crcycd, a.prodcd, a.clactp, a.toacct, sum(case a.amntcd when 'D' then tranam when 'C' then -tranam end) sumamt from kns_acsq_cler a where a.trandt = #trandt# and a.transt = 2 and a.clerst = 0 group by a.acctno, a.acctna, a.acctbr, a.crcycd, a.prodcd, a.clactp, a.toacct

dynamicSelect.longname: 根据对账日期查询出入金登记薄
根据对账日期查询大小额来往账明细

select.longname: 根据对账日期查询总金额及总条数
select.sql: select count(1) as counts,sum(tranam) as tranam from (select a.tranam from knl_iobl a where a.servdt=#trandt# and a.status!=5 and a.servtp=#servtp# union all select b.tranam from knb_rptr_detl b where b.chckdt=#trandt# and transt!=5 and stady1!='S')

select.longname: 根据对账日期查询来往账明细总金额及总记录数
select.sql: select count(1) as counts,sum(tranam) as tranam from knl_cnapot where servdt=#trandt# and subsys=#subsys# and status!=5

select.longname: 根据对账日期查询银联CUPS总金额及总记录数
select.sql: select count(1) as counts,sum(tranam) as tranam from knl_iobl_cups where unkpdt=#trandt#

update.longname: 更新清算明细的同步状态

sql.desc: 清算明细汇总后，更新清算明细的同步状态为已同步

update.sql: update kns_acsq_cler a set a.clerst = '1' where a.trandt =#trandt# and a.transt = 2 and a.clerst = 0

dynamicSelect.longname: 根据对账日期查询红包系统交易明细表

select.longname: 根据对账日期查询代发总金额及总记录数
select.sql: select count(1) as counts,sum(tranam) as tranam from Knl_Iobl_Edm where trandt=#trandt#

dynamicSelect.longname: 根据对账日期查询代发转账登记薄
根据对账日期查询代发转账登记薄控制表

select.longname: 根据对账日期查询代发防重复控制表
select.sql: select count(1) as counts from Knl_Iobl_Edm_Contro where trandt=#trandt#
select count(1) as counts from Knl_Iobl_Edm_Contro where trandt=#trandt#
select count(1) as counts from Knl_Iobl_Edm_Contro where trandt=#trandt# and transt!=2

select.longname: 查询收单反交易金额及数量
select.sql: select count(1) as counts from knl_iobl_cups_re where unkpdt=#trandt#
select count(1) as counts from knl_iobl_cups_re where unkpdt=#trandt#

select.longname: 根据对账日期查询银联CUPS转账登记薄
select.sql: select flowid , servtp, uniseq, unkpdt, messtp, tranam, refeno, ordeno, cardno, inmeid, inmena, transt, mntrsq, trandt, mntrtm, prepsq, prepdt, preptm, sbrand, busitp, teleno, tmteleno, '' as cardtp, '' as merate, jnanam, voucfe, toanam, '' as finsty, '' as acfist, chrgam, CAST(0.00 AS NUMBER (10, 2) ) as ad01am, reflid, '' as signim, fiel0, fiel03 , CAST(0.00 AS NUMBER (10, 2) ) as bscdam , CAST(0.00 AS NUMBER (10, 2) ) as svntam, CAST(0.00 AS NUMBER (10, 2) ) as unbdam from knl_iobl_cups_re a where a.unkpdt=#trandt# union select flowid , servtp, uniseq, unkpdt, messtp, tranam, refeno, ordeno, cardno, inmeid, inmena, transt, mntrsq, trandt, mntrtm, prepsq, prepdt, preptm, sbrand, busitp, teleno, tmteleno, cardtp, merate, jnanam, voucfe, toanam, finsty, acfist, chrgam, CAST(ad01am AS NUMBER (10, 2) ) as ad01am, reflid, signim, fiel0, fiel03 , CAST(bscdam AS NUMBER (10, 2) ) as bscdam, CAST(svntam AS NUMBER (10, 2) ) as svntam , CAST(unbdam AS NUMBER (10, 2) ) as unbdam from knl_iobl_cups b where b.unkpdt=#trandt# order by mntrsq asc

select.longname: 通过对账日期取对账信息
select.sql: SELECT a.CLTRSQ, a.CLTRDT, a.ISCHCK, a.CKTRDT, a.JFTRTP, a.CLERTP, a.POSNUM, a.INMEID, a.YSUNAM, a.YFMCAM, a.DIVDAM, a.DIVDFE, a.UNAMFE, a.TRANAM, a.VOUCFE, a.MARKFE, a.CRCYCD, a.PABKNO, a.OTBKNA, a.PAMENO, a.PAMENA, a.REMARK, a.CHANTP, a.SVCODE, a.MNTRSQ, a.MNTRDT, a.MNTRTM, a.STRKSQ, a.STRKDT, a.STRKTM, a.TRANST FROM kns_acsq_rgst a WHERE a.ISCHCK = '1' AND a.transt = '9' AND a.cktrdt = '#cktrdt#'
